/opt/rocm/llvm/bin/clang  -fsanitize=address --offload-arch=gfx90a:xnack+ -shared-libsan   CMakeFiles/test_cpp.dir/square.cpp.o  -o test_cpp  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/lib /opt/rocm/lib/libamdhip64.so.6.0.60100 --hip-link /opt/rocm-6.1.0-13031/lib/llvm/lib/clang/17.0.0/lib/linux/libclang_rt.builtins-x86_64.a
